snippet: In her book “Just Kids From the Bronx,” the author Arlene Alda collects more than 60 evocative oral histories from a diverse group that includes Colin L. Powell, Carl Reiner, Neil DeGrasse Tysonand Chazz Palminteri.
abstract: Sam Roberts reviews books Just Kids From the Bronx: Telling It the Way It Was, edited by Arlene Alda, and Stop at the Red Apple Rest: The Restaurant on Route 17 by Elaine Freed Lindenblatt.
lead_paragraph: In her book “Just Kids From the Bronx,” the author Arlene Alda collects more than 60 evocative oral histories from a diverse group that includes Colin L. Powell, Carl Reiner, Neil DeGrasse Tysonand Chazz Palminteri.
